author: mbaessler
msg: add additional init parameter to the web.xml to specify the PEAR install path.
If a relative path is specified, the path is evaluated relative to the PEAR file location.

author: jdillon
msg: Drop tools-maven-plugin, preparing to nuke it from genesis, will replace with alternative plugin soon

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3397: Derby 10.3.1.4 and 10.3.2.1 break scrollable result sets? Hibernate Query.setFirstResult and/or setMaxResults.
This change makes setMaxRows take effect by resetting the value in the result set object to the value held in the activation.
Patch contributed by Dag H. Wanvik.
